review_title: Nice place to work but salaries a bit low
pros: Colleagues, students and administration are great to work with.
cons: Budget constraints result in low salaries except for “star” faculty.

job_title: Work Study Student in Cleveland, OH
pros: Plenty of jobs available if you study there and have an award. The staff is nice.
cons: Some jobs do not offer many hours of work.

pros: Wonderful co-workers and you are constantly surrounded by beautiful music
cons: Leadership is very out of touch with day to day operations. Pay is very low for the amount of work that staff is doing. Most staff members work far beyond their job descriptions.

job_title: Front of House Staff in Cleveland, OH
pros:
Opportunity to watch concerts for free
Chance to get to know frequent concert goers and donors
Easy!!
cons:
Little pay
Late hours...sucks if you live off campus and have no car
Repetitive
